definition[0]: an animal or plant produced by scientists from one cell of another animal or plant, so that they are exactly the same
definition[1]: a computer that is built as an exact copy of a more famous computer
definition[2]: someone or something that looks and behaves exactly the same as someone or something else
example[1]: She’s an exact clone of her sister!
definition[3]: to make an exact copy of a plant or animal by taking a cell from it and developing it artificially
definition[4]: to copy the number of someone else’s mobile phone onto a new chip and then use that number on a different telephone, so that the mobile phone’s owner receives the telephone bill
definition[5]: a computer that is almost an exact copy of a different type of computer and can use programs that were written for it
definition[6]: to copy the details from someone’s bank card or credit card in order to illegally create a new card
example[2]: I contacted the bank and was told my debit card had been cloned and my account had been emptied.
